verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3213>"Wail,<s%> <S%H1929>'Alas<s%> for the <S%H3117>day!<s%>'

"For the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> Even the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7138>near;<s%> It will be a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6051>clouds,<s%> A <S%H6256>time<s%> [of doom] for the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

"And a <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> And <S%H2479>anguish<s%> will be in <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> When the <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> They <S%H3947>take<s%> away her <S%H1995>wealth,<s%> And her <S%H3247>foundations<s%> are <S%H2040>torn<s%> <S%H2040>down.<s%>

<S%H3568>"Ethiopia,<s%> <S%H6316>Put,<s%> <S%H3865>Lud,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6152>Arabia,<s%> <S%H3864>Libya,<s%> and the <S%H1121>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> that is in <S%H1285>league<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> with them by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>"

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "Indeed, those who <S%H5564>support<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H5307>fall,<s%> And the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of her <S%H5797>power<s%> will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down;<s%> From <S%H4024>Migdol<s%> [to] <S%H5482>Syene<s%> They will <S%H5307>fall<s%> within her by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%>" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"And they will be <S%H8074>desolate<s%> In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H8074>desolated<s%> <S%H776>lands;<s%> And her <S%H5892>cities<s%> will be In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2717>devastated<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

"And they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> When I <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5826>helpers<s%> are <S%H7665>broken.<s%>

"On that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> will <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from Me in <S%H6716>ships<s%> to <S%H2729>frighten<s%> <S%H983>secure<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopia;<s%> and <S%H2479>anguish<s%> will be on them as on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it <S%H935>comes!<s%>"

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I will also make the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> By the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

"He and his <S%H5971>people<s%> with him, The <S%H6184>most<s%> <S%H6184>ruthless<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> Will be <S%H935>brought<s%> in to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> And they will <S%H9553>draw<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> And <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

"Moreover, I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> <S%H2975>canals<s%> <S%H2724>dry<s%> And <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7451>men.<s%> And I will <S%H8074>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> And <S%H4393>all<s%> that is in it, By the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers;<s%> I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>"

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I will also destroy the <S%H6>idols<s%> And make the <S%H1544>images<s%> <S%H457>cease<s%> from <S%H7673>Memphis.<s%> And there will <S%H5297>no<s%> <S%H3808>longer<s%> be a <S%H5750>prince<s%> in the <S%H5387>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt;<s%> And I will <S%H4714>put<s%> <S%H5414>fear<s%> in the <S%H3374>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt.<s%>

"And I will <S%H8074>make<s%> <S%H6624>Pathros<s%> <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H5414>Set<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H6814>Zoan,<s%> And <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on <S%H4996>Thebes.<s%>

"And I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> out My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on <S%H5512>Sin,<s%> The <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> I will also <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4996>Thebes.<s%>

"And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H5512>Sin<s%> will <S%H9123>writhe<s%> in <S%H9123>anguish,<s%> <S%H4996>Thebes<s%> will be <S%H1234>breached,<s%> And <S%H5297>Memphis<s%> [will have] <S%H6862>distresses<s%> <S%H3119>daily.<s%>

"The <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> of <S%H204>On<s%> and of Pi-beseth Will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> And the <S%H1992>women<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

"And in <S%H8471>Tehaphnehes<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> will be <S%H2821>dark<s%> When I <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H4133>yoke<s%> <S%H4133>bars<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> Then the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of her <S%H5797>power<s%> will <S%H7673>cease<s%> in her; A <S%H6051>cloud<s%> will <S%H3680>cover<s%> her, And her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>
"Thus I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> And they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"' "

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>[month,<s%>] on the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> of the month, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it has not been <S%H2280>bound<s%> up for <S%H7499>healing<s%> or <S%H2280>wrapped<s%> with a <S%H2848>bandage,<s%> that it may be <S%H2388>strong<s%> to <S%H8610>hold<s%> the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and will <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H2220>arms,<s%> both the <S%H2389>strong<s%> and the <S%H7665>broken;<s%> and I will make the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
'And I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them among the <S%H776>lands.<s%>

'For I will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> My <S%H2719>sword<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> so that he will <S%H5008>groan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him with the <S%H5009>groanings<s%> of a <S%H2491>wounded<s%> <S%H2491>man.<s%>

'Thus I will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> but the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will <S%H5307>fall.<s%> Then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when I <S%H5414>put<s%> My <S%H2719>sword<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and he <S%H5186>stretches<s%> it out <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

'When I <S%H6327>scatter<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them among the <S%H776>lands,<s%> then they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' "
